exclusion.criterion: currently receiving any current trauma-focused psychological treatment (i.e., prolonged exposure therapy, cognitive processing therapy, eye movement desensitization reprocessing)

notes: Patient has myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and fatigue and weakness that affects mainly her upper limbs.
